pages.text: Druids need access to various natural resources to produce their magical effects. This includes magical herbs, each of which have ties to nature in different ways. Discovering a herb will unlock many mysteries hidden in nature, and provide access to new tools, spells and rituals for the aspiring druid.

Other resources are far more mundane, but still critical to unlocking the full potential of the natural arts. Resources like $(l:resources/bark)Bark$() and the $(l:resources/aubergine)Aubergine$() allow a druid access to the energies of nature itself. All of these resources are documented within this book.
